widgets_values: An underwater view where the man struggles in the murky water, but suddenly gets attacked and eaten by a massive shark in a chaotic, fast-paced, and terrifying sequence.

widgets_values: the man gets eaten by a shark

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 1
widgets_values: The scene explodes into action as a violent gust of wind nearly knocks the man over; he grabs his hat and stumbles forward while massive waves behind him crash explosively over the rocks, spraying water into the air.

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 2
widgets_values: Suddenly, a loud thunderclap startles the man; he flinches visibly and turns his head sharply to the left, his eyes widening in panic as he spots something terrifying off-screen.

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 4
widgets_values: The man grabs the railing and begins to sprint desperately up the spiral staircase; the camera follows his upward movement as he stumbles slightly in his haste, looking back over his shoulder.

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 5
widgets_values: He grabs the heavy iron lever and pulls it down with force. Immediately, the massive gears start to grind and turn, causing the giant lighthouse lens to rotate rapidly, casting spinning beams of light across the room.

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 6
widgets_values: The man frantically bangs his fists against the glass panes, shouting silently into the storm. Outside, the weather worsens significantly, with lightning strikes flashing rapidly and illuminating his desperate silhouette.

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 7
widgets_values: The man climbs over the safety railing of the lighthouse balcony. He teeters precariously on the edge for a split second, looking down at the churning water, before letting go and dropping out of the frame.

# WAN 2.2 Video Extender High/Low Noise (Beta)

## ‚ö†Ô∏è BETA WARNING
This workflow separates High and Low noise handling for advanced control.
**Important:** Please monitor your **System RAM** (CPU RAM, not VRAM). RAM usage may increase significantly and potentially overflow after **Loop 5**, depending on your hardware configuration.

## üì¶ Required Models

You need to load separate models for High and Low noise processing.

### 1. Diffusion Models (Checkpoints)
* **High Noise:** [wan2.2_t2v_high_noise_14B_fp8_scaled](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.2_ComfyUI_Repackaged/blob/main/split_files/diffusion_models/wan2.2_t2v_high_noise_14B_fp8_scaled.safetensors)
* **Low Noise:** [wan2.2_t2v_low_noise_14B_fp8_scaled](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.2_ComfyUI_Repackaged/blob/main/split_files/diffusion_models/wan2.2_t2v_low_noise_14B_fp8_scaled.safetensors)

### 2. VACE Modules (For Model Selector)
* **High Noise:** [Wan2_2_Fun_VACE_module_A14B_HIGH_bf16](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Fun/VACE/Wan2_2_Fun_VACE_module_A14B_HIGH_bf16.safetensors)
* **Low Noise:** [Wan2_2_Fun_VACE_module_A14B_LOW_bf16](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Fun/VACE/Wan2_2_Fun_VACE_module_A14B_LOW_bf16.safetensors)

### 3. LoRAs (4-Steps Lightx2v)
* **High Noise:** [wan2.2_i2v_lightx2v_4steps_lora_v1.0_high](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.2_ComfyUI_Repackaged/blob/main/split_files/loras/wan2.2_i2v_lightx2v_4steps_lora_v1_high_noise.safetensors)
* **Low Noise:** [wan2.2_i2v_lightx2v_4steps_lora_v1.0_low](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.2_ComfyUI_Repackaged/blob/main/split_files/loras/wan2.2_i2v_lightx2v_4steps_lora_v1_low_noise.safetensors)

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Recommended Settings

- **Steps:** `4` (optimized for rapid generation with Lightx2v LoRAs)
- **Sampler:** `euler` / `simple`
- **CFG:** `1.0` (Standard for these LoRAs, adjust if needed)
- **Overlap Frames:** `16` (more overlap = better consistency)

## üé¨ Quick Start

1. **Load Models:** Ensure all High/Low components are connected to their respective loaders.
2. **Input Options:**
   - Video: Extends existing video
   - Image: Creates video from static image
   - No input: Generates from scratch
3. **Extension Loops:**
   - Each loop generates `generate_frames` (default: 81 frames)
   - Use per-loop prompts to guide the story.

## üíæ Memory & Performance Tips

- **System RAM Alert:** Unlike the standard version, this Beta may accumulate **RAM** usage. If you plan to go beyond 5 loops, ensure you have sufficient swap space or physical RAM.
- **Disk Storage:** Segments are automatically saved to disk to minimize VRAM usage.
- **Speed:** With 4 steps/frame, generation is rapid, but loading two separate model weights may slightly increase startup time compared to the All-In-One version.

---

**Node Version:** High/Low Noise Beta (Memory Optimized)

nodes.title: Prompt Loop 3
widgets_values: Using all his strength, the man opens the heavy door , the wind instantly catches it and slams it against the inner wall, blowing his coat wildly as he rushes inside to escape the storm.
